name: Limb Lagoon
description:
Made in about 36 hours for the "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (again) Jam"

You play as a crab on a procedurally generated beach fighting off continually spawning disembodied limbs.

Controls:

- WASD or Arrow keys to move

-Mouse to aim your claws

-Left click to shoot out your claws

Since i made it in so little time it is quite buggy and just a bit of a mess in general but it was still fun working on this and a blast to be apart of the jam.

I didn't end up adding any music to the game so i included a folder of classical music and an original track i made a while back as compensation :)
